9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Bakr As-Siddiq narrated that:The Messenger of Allah was asked: "Which Hajj is the most virtuous?" He said: "That with raised voices (Al-Ajj) and the flow of blood (of the sacrifice) (Ath-Thajj)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ التَّلْبِيَةِ وَالنَّحْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtue Of The Talbiyah And the Nahr (Sacrifice)
